data.title: Queensland Premier Rugby finals venues locked in
data.meta_description: The Queensland Rugby Union has confirmed the Queensland Premier Rugby Finals Schedule for season 2024, culminating with the Grand Finals once again at Ballymore Stadium across the August 31 – September 1 weekend.
data.text:
The Queensland Rugby Union has confirmed the Queensland Premier Rugby Finals Schedule for season 2024, culminating with the Grand Finals once again at Ballymore Stadium across the August 31 – September 1 weekend.

Ballymore Stadium, including the $31.5 million BMS National Rugby Training Centre, will once again play host to the QPR’s biggest games including standalone fixtures on Sunday for the StoreLocal Hospital Cup, StoreLocal Premier Women and Colts One deciders.

The QRU has also confirmed the venues and schedule for the semi and preliminary finals which will commence on Saturday August 17.

The major Semi Finals will be contested at GPS on Saturday, August 17, while Sunnybank is set to host the minor Semi Finals on Sunday, August 18.

Week two of the finals will head to Sylvan Road as Wests will host Saturday’s lower grade Preliminary Finals with Brothers to host the Preliminary Finals for Premier Women, Colts 1 and Hospital Cup.

The three-week finals schedule will culminate in all grades playing at Ballymore Stadium.

Tickets for the QPR Grand Finals – for both Saturday and Sunday – will be on sale soon.

2024 Queensland Premier Rugby Grand Final Schedule

MAJOR SEMI FINALS - Saturday August 17 - GPS Rugby Club

QPR Colts 3 – GPS Field 3 – 9:30am

5th Grade – GPS Field 2 – 9:30am

Colts 2 – GPS Field 3 – 10:50am

4th Grade – GPS Field 2 – 10:50am

StoreLocal Premier Women – GPS Field 1 – 10:50am

3rd Grade – GPS Field 2 – 12:10pm

Colts 1 – GPS Field 1 – 12:10pm

2nd Grade – GPS Field 1 – 12:10pm

StoreLocal Hospital Cup – GPS Field 1 – 3:05pm

MINOR SEMI FINALS – Sunday August 18

QPR Colts 3 – Sunnybank Field 1 – 9:30am

5th Grade – Sunnybank Field 2 – 9:30am

Colts 2 – Sunnybank Field 1 – 10:50am

4th Grade – Sunnybank Field 2 – 10:50am

Colts 1 – Sunnybank Field 1 – 12:10pm

3rd Grade – Sunnybank Field 2 – 12:10pm

2nd Grade – Sunnybank Field 1 – 1:30pm

StoreLocal Hospital Cup – Sunnybank Field 1 – 3:05pm

StoreLocal Premier Women – Sunnybank Field 1 – 5:00pm

PRELIMINARY FINALS

QPR Colts 3 – Wests Field 1 – 9:30am

5th Grade – Wests Field 1 – 10:50am

Colts 2 – Wests Field 1 – 12:10pm

4th Grade – Wests Field 1 – 1:30pm

3rd Grade – Wests Field 1 – 2:50pm

2nd Grade – Wests Field 1 – 4:10pm

StoreLocal Premier Women – Brothers Field 1 – 11:40am

Colts 1 – Brothers Field 1 – 1:00pm

StoreLocal Hospital Cup – Brothers Field 1 – 2:40pm

GRAND FINALS

QPR Colts 3 – Ballymore Field 3 – 9:30am

5th Grade – Ballymore Field 1 – 9:30am

Colts 2 – Ballymore Field 3 – 11:15am

4th Grade – Ballymore Field 1 – 11:15am

3rd Grade – Ballymore Field 1 – 1:00pm

2nd Grade – Ballymore Field 1 – 4:10pm

StoreLocal Premier Women – Ballymore Field 1 – 11:00am

Colts 1 – Ballymore Field 1 – 12:45pm

StoreLocal Hospital Cup – Ballymore Field 1 – 2:45pm
